```pddl
[
  '(:action scrub
    :parameters (?entity - object ?agent - person)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?entity) (cleanness ?entity dirty))
    :effect (and (cleanness ?entity clean) (wetness ?entity wet)))',

  '(:action place
    :parameters (?u - user ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?u ?item1) (at ?u ?item2) (not (location ?item1 ?location)))
    :effect (and (location ?item1 ?location) (or (location ?item2 on_item1) (temperature ?item1 cold) (emptiness ?item1 full))))',

  '(:action replace
    :parameters (?user - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?user ?item) (state ?item open))
    :effect (and (state ?item closed) (labeled ?item true)))',

  '(:action finish
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?location - place ?status - state)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?actor ?location)
        (status ?item in_progress)
        (not (status ?item ?status)))
    :effect (status ?item ?status))',

  '(:action finish
    :parameters (?u - user ?w - object ?location - place ?status - state)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?u ?location)
        (status ?w in_progress)
        (not (status ?w ?status)))
    :effect (status ?w ?status))',

  '(:action finish
    :parameters (?worker - person ?bottle - object ?workstation - place ?status - state)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?worker ?workstation)
        (status ?bottle in_progress)
        (not (status ?bottle ?status)))
    :effect (status ?bottle ?status))'
]
```
